data.aiOpinion: {"Problem_Found":"The command 'ntp update-calendar' is not commonly used with some IOS versions, it may lead to misconfiguration or unintended behavior if not supported.","Category":"Time Synchronization","Outage_Potentials":{"Data_Plane":false,"Control_Plane":true},"Possible_Solution":"Verify IOS version compatibility with the 'ntp update-calendar' command and ensure the correct syntax is used."}
